item.title: No errors, but still doesn't function?
item.dc:creator: @David_L_F David_L_F
item.description:
@David_L_F wrote:

I’m remaking the famous GS minigame . Monsters drop the shards, you use the shards on one another and make the blade, then you use the blade with the hilt and make a godsword. So far, I’ve made this.

BUT, it doesn’t work at all. I get no compile errors, but no function either.

This is what i’ve got. [code]else if (useItemID == 15341 && useItemID == 15342) // GodswordShard3
{
sendMessage(
“You apply the Shards together, use the Shard on Shard 3 for Blade!”);
deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1);
deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1);
addItem(15329, 1);

        } else if (useItemID == 15341 && useItemID == 15342) // GodswordShard3
        {
            sendMessage(
                    "You apply the Shards together, use the Shard on Shard 3 for Blade!");
            deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1);
            deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1);
addItem(15329, 1);

        } else if (useItemID == 15343 && useItemID == 15329) // GodswordBlade
        {
            sendMessage(
                    "You apply the Shards together, and get a blade! Use on any Hilt!");
            deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1);
            deleteItem(15329, getItemSlot(15329), 1);
addItem(15331, 1);

        } else if (useItemID == 15337 && atItemID == 15331) // AGS
        {
            sendMessage(
                    "You apply the blade and hilt, and you make an Armadyl GodSword!");
            addSkillXP((70000 * playerLevel[13]), 13);
            deleteItem(15337, getItemSlot(15337), 1);
            deleteItem(15331, getItemSlot(15331), 1);
addItem(15333, 1);

        } else if (useItemID == 15339 && useItemID == 15331) // SGS
        {
            sendMessage(
                    "You apply the blade and hilt, and you make a Saradomin GodSword!");
            addSkillXP((70000 * playerLevel[13]), 13);
            deleteItem(15339, getItemSlot(15339), 1);
            deleteItem(15331, getItemSlot(15331), 1);
addItem(15335, 1);

        } else if (useItemID == 15340 && useItemID == 15331) // ZGS
        {
            sendMessage(
                    "You apply the blade and hilt, and you make a Zamorak GodSword!");
            addSkillXP((70000 * playerLevel[13]), 13);
            deleteItem(15340, getItemSlot(15340), 1);
            deleteItem(15331, getItemSlot(15331), 1);
addItem(15336, 1);

        } else if (useItemID == 15338 && useItemID == 15331) // BGS
        {
            sendMessage(
                    "You apply the blade and hilt, and you make a Bandos GodSword!");
            addSkillXP((70000 * playerLevel[13]), 13);
            deleteItem(15338, getItemSlot(15338), 1);
            deleteItem(15331, getItemSlot(15331), 1);
addItem(15334, 1);

        }[/code]

Read full topic
